text: * Use substitution variables to get data in * Preceding an attribute with an ampersand allows the user to enter a value. * These are all populated at the start of execution, like passing a parameter. * This means * they cannot be in an ‘IF’ statement * They cannot be in a loop DECLARE V_StaffPaid B2_STAFF.STAFF_NOSTYPE:=&Staff No; V_CustId B2_CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ ID%TYPE:=&Customer Id;
